Summary: I was taking pictures of the full moon with a halo around it. When I was downloading the pictures I saw a small bright round object which appeared on the left side of the moon.
divs: sighting detailson sunday morning nov 21\2010 at 12:20am, i was taking pictures of the full moon with a halo. i took 5 pictures of the moon. when i reviewed the pictures in my camera at approximately 12:30a.m. i realized that only one of the pictures had a small bright object near the moon. i enlarged the picture on my camera and realized that the object appeared in many colors (green, blue, red). the following day i developed the picture with the enlarged object and it appeared that there is a disk shape in the middle of the sphere. this object appears to be similar to the event reported on your sight nov 21\ at 8:20pm in florida, when the individual was downloading pictures. i think the object was a ufo. pictures will be available upon request.
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around November 21st 2010
